approach: Add two entries to the root .gitignore file: `.specks-worktrees/` for worktree directories (per D01) and `.specks/step-artifacts/` for optional local debug artifacts (per Q04 resolution). This is a minimal change to a single file with no code dependencies.

implementation_steps.description: Add `.specks-worktrees/` entry to .gitignore under a new section comment (e.g., '# Specks worktrees'). This directory will hold isolated worktree checkouts for speck implementations per D01.
Add `.specks/step-artifacts/` entry to .gitignore under the same or a related section comment. This directory holds optional local debug artifacts per Q04 resolution.

test_plan: Run the checkpoint commands from the speck: `grep -q 'specks-worktrees' .gitignore` should return success (exit code 0), and `grep -q 'specks/step-artifacts' .gitignore` should return success (exit code 0).
risks: Minimal risk - this is a simple text file modification with no code impact
